Package org.openmuc.jdlms.client

General API classes to send requests to a remote station

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
HlsSecretProcessor Interface used to provide a manufacturer specific way for processing the secret with a given salt according to the high level authentication stated in IEC 62056-62 4.7.2 Pass 3 and 4.
IAttributeRequest Declares methods that both GetRequest and SetRequest use.
IClientConnection This interface is the central user API to communicate over DLMS/Cosem.
IClientConnectionFactory Interface of a factory for IClientConnection objects.
IEventListener Callback interface used to notify the user of events from a remote smart meter
 

Class Summary
ClientConnectionSettings<E extends ClientConnectionSettings<E>> Basic settings all DLMS connections must at least have.
Data Container class holding data about to send to the smart meter or received by the smart meter
EventNotification Container holding all data received from an event that the remote station sent
GetRequest Collection of data needed for a single remote GET call
GetResult Container class holding the result of a get operation received from the smart meter
MethodRequest Collection of data needed for a single remote ACTION call
MethodResult Container class holding the results of a remote method invocation via action operation
ObisCode Represents the address of a remote object according to IEC 62056-61.
SelectiveAccessDescription Additional Paramter of GetParameter to narrow the results of a get operation on the smart meter.
SetRequest Collection of data needed for a single remote SET call
 

Enum Summary
AccessResultCode Enumeration of all possible result codes the smart meter can send after a get or set operation has been processed
ClientConnectionSettings.Authentication Used to set the level of authentication on establishing the connection to the smart meter
ClientConnectionSettings.ConfirmedMode Used to set if the smart meter shall answer to each message sent
ClientConnectionSettings.ReferencingMethod Used to determine which sort of name referencing the remote smart meter uses.
Data.Choices Enumeration of all data types the Data class can hold.
MethodResultCode Enumeration of all possible result code a smart meter can send after a method has been called via an action operation
 

Package org.openmuc.jdlms.client Description

General API classes to send requests to a remote station
